channel.title: Projects on Ithihas Madala
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ithihas Madala

item.title: Gene Signal Processing
item.description: GSP involves the construction of Fourier Series/Spectrograms from DNA sequences. Constructing these spectrograms is a challenge, as there are many ways to go about it, and we would like to explore this area further. Further, we would be using these spectrograms for the classification of genes using Deep Learning algorithms like CNNs and transformers.

item.title: Sperm Video Analysis
item.description: In the study, they have worked with 81 sperm videos (Visem dataset) and classified the samples into progressive, non-progressive, and immotile spermatozoa.
